params.prompt: The scene is set in a minimalist indoor space with a white ceiling, a dark-framed door slightly ajar, and a white wall with a circular light fixture. A man is seated, wearing a crisp white button-up shirt with a chest pocket and a neat closed collar, along with a black wristwatch. He has short, dark hair and is centered in the frame. The bright, even lighting creates a clean, modern atmosphere. The man engages in a conversation or presentation, gesturing expressively with his hands. He starts with a thumbs-up gesture, then moves to an open hand, emphasizing his points. His right hand moves up and down, while his left hand points, and as he continues speaking, he brings his hands closer together. The right hand becomes more prominent in its gestures, sometimes moving closer to his body, while the left remains relatively still. The camera remains static, capturing each gesture without moving the subject's head or body.
params.negative_prompt: 色调艳丽，过曝，静态，细节模糊不清，字幕，风格，作品，画作，画面，静止，整体发灰，最差质量，低质量，JPEG压缩残留，丑陋的，残缺的，多余的手指，画得不好的手部，画得不好的脸部，畸形的，毁容的，形态畸形的肢体，手指融合，静止不动的画面，杂乱的背景，三条腿，背景人很多，倒着走
